titleStmt.title: The innocency of the Christian Quakers manifested, and the truth of their principles and doctrine cleared and defended from the loud (but false) clamours, base insinuations and wicked slanders of James Barry. / Published for the general satisfaction and benefit of all, who simply desire to know and embrace the truth.
titleStmt.author: Burnyeat, John, 1631-1690.
Strettell, Amos.
Barry, James.

notesStmt.note: Signed: John Burnyeat, Amos Strettell, Dublin the 20th of the first month, 1687/8.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London.
